DERBY-5233 Interrupt of create table or index (i.e. a container) will throw XSDF1 under NIO - connection survives
Patch DERBY-5233-2: The patch makes RAFContainer, when seeing an interrupt exception during container creation, close it down and try again, up to MAX_INTERRUPT_RETRIES times. Since RAFContainer should work also under CDC/Foundation 1.1, the exceptions are checked using reflection (NIO classes are excluded there).
I also adds a new test case to InterruptResilienceTest: testCreateDropInterrupted.
